text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
A special exchange…… After calming down and thinking 
of the contents, it's quite a favorable offer……

『The Special Exchange System』. 
I reminded Furioso of the potential benefits of this.

While remaining on the Funabashi roster, she 
could attend Central Tracen and use the facilities 
freely. Offers this good were quite rare.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I understand the difference in strength between Central and us. 
However……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
If the facilities here aren't very different from what we have, 
there's no need to attend. Let's calmly decide based on what we see.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Furioso-san, Trainer-san, good afternoon. 
I'm the Tracen Academy Chairman's secretary, Hayakawa Tazuna.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Well then, I'll show you around the campus grounds.

And so, with Tazuna-san as our guide, 
we decided to take a look around Central Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
This is the cafeteria. As a student of Tracen 
Academy, lunch is free and all-you-can-eat.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
All-you-can-eat……!? And always free……!? 
Students don't get just a 150 yen discount on their lunches?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Wait, Trainer. 
Don't be tempted by Central.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
We can't be lured in by food. 
We're just here to observe.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
This is the training gym. 
All of these machines have been tuned for Uma Musume use.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
This is the pool. Uma Musume with leg injuries or that 
wish to train their stamina usually make use of it.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
This is the training ground. Various surfaces, including 
turf, dirt, and wood chips are options. And then……

text_block_list.name: Oguri & Inari
text_block_list.text:
Haaaaaaaa! 
Deryaaaaーー!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Everyone is free to compete with each other, gradually 
increasing their strength. Oguri Cap-san and Inari 
One-san are also both transfers from the countryside.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Amazing…… 
The grounds, the facilities, everything is on a different level……
choice_data_list: Yeah, the gap is so huge……
Yeah, the gap is so huge……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Yes. The gap isn't just big…… 
Trainer, look closely. At this dirt.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Yes, what's more intimidating than the size 
of the facilities——is these grains of sand.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Everywhere一it's uniformly distributed. 
To help reduce the burden on our legs, cleanly……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Just how much staff would be required to maintain this? 
And their skill level……is quite considerable.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
It's frustrating but……the difference between Funabashi is large…… 
Everything is just on a different level……

Furioso and I, as much as possible, wanted to 
remain in Funabashi and enter Central races.

But, if there was such a big difference between Funabashi 
and here……then the choice was painfully obvious.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I think we have no choice but to reconsider. 
About the 『Special exchange』

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Together with Trainer, I need to dive in to enemy territory 
and break out from inside. Let's go with that.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad you've taken an interest. 
Um……however, there's one thing you should know.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Furioso-san can enter through the 『Special exchange』 however…… 
Trainer-san, are you aware that you can't?

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Yes. There are no special exceptions for that. 
Local and Central trainer qualifications are separate licenses.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san has to take the Central 
『Trainer License Exam』 and pass.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Central's License Exam is it? It sounds like it'll 
be difficult, but……with Trainer's skills, then.

I'm confident in my skills. Even if the location is different, 
a trainer is still a trainer. The techniques to bring out the 
strength of Uma Musume are the same. In that case——

If I can perform as usual, 
then the results will surely follow.
And then, the day the results of the License Exam were announced——

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Ha……?

I desperately search the names again. 
But——

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: No way……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: It's not there……your name.
